title: Daily power-cuts of 1 hr. 45 mts. are back from today
content: Power-cuts of one-hour-and-forty-five-minutes durations per day are back from today (18) across the island.The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka (PUCSL) has given permission for one-hour supply disruptions between 2.30 pm and 6.30 pm.Further, 45-minute power cuts will be imposed between 6.30 pm and 10.30 pm.
